data.title: Pollocks B&B
data.text:
Set in East London in the Eastern Cape region, with famous Nahoon Beach nearby, Pollock’s B&B offers airconditioned accommodation with free Wi-Fi and free private parking.

The units, complete with patio, feature a flat-screen TV and have ensuite private bathrooms with shower and free toiletries. A kettle, microwave and fridge are also provided.

Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a Full English breakfast served to their room.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

East London Aquarium is 2.8 km from Pollock’s B&B, while East London Museum is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is East London Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

Pollock’s B&B has been welcoming guests since 1997.

The name Pollock is synonymous with the Eastern Cape and our three children are fourth generation East London Pollocks. Over the years we have both invested our time and energy into uplifting the East London community. We initially opened our B&B in 1997, to accommodate reps calling on our business, Pollocks Sports. Our central location, in the tranquil suburb of Baysville Extension, makes for quick and convenient access to all parts of the city. We pride ourselves on our hospitality and provide up-market accommodation at competitive rates and look forward to meeting you!

Dave & Lindsey Pollock, Your Hosts

Family Room

This is a large and airy en-suite room with two ¾ beds, a double sleeper couch and a dining room table. This room opens onto its own patio garden. It comfortably sleeps four if the double sleeper couch is used.

Room Facilities: En-suite (with shower and bath), DSTV, Flat screen TV, Free Wi-Fi,Fan, Heater, Air conditioner, Tea and coffee making facilities, Bar Fridge, Hair Dryer, Iron and ironing board.

Price Per Night *Includes Breakfast
